item.title: Computer Networks
item.author: Author
item.description: Computer Networks Foreword: References: Videos: 2021王道计算机网络 on YouTube eBook: Google Drive Link here (Chinese) Power Point: Google Drive Link here (Chinese) Ch 01. System’s Structure of Computer Networks Definition: A System that connects distributed and independent Computer Systems through Devices and Cables, therefore the Resources-Sharing and Information-Transportation are realized. It’s a Combination of connected and independent Computers. Functions:
